channel.title: Need help with changing home etc
channel.description:
Hello People, I wanna know how i can change home in an other place, and all the things from the mage book , at an 317 server.
thanks

item.title: Need help with changing home etc
item.dc:creator: @vlad1 vlad1
item.description:
@vlad1 wrote:

[quote=“kleber883, post:3, topic:360621”]NOT a tutorial… Someone want to explain how these get classified as such? Am I missing some vital piece of information here?

-Kleber[/quote]
Well this is quite a basic explanation,but he also has to go into spawn-config and change the npcs to the new coords.
IF you need help,feel free to pm me I specialise in 317’s both [pi] and [delta].
Also you will have to change the obects locations aswell :3.

Read full topic
